body:
Khalid,

Since Mostapha just added a feature to the example file platform, I can show you exactly what I mean in the example file:

[http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=chriswmackey&for...](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=chriswmackey&fork=hydra_2&id=Estimate_Glare_Potential_Over_a_Year&slide=0&scale=6.062866266041595&offset=-1240.7052727453722,-972.813427847231)

-Chris
